co.uk.niadel.mpi.napioredict

Class NAPIOreDict

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.napioredict.NAPIOreDict

  • public final class NAPIOreDict
extends java.lang.Object
    The N-API port of Forge's Ore Dictionary. I say port, I just rewrote it entirely to work with N-API. And Ore dictionary was a bad name, it's not just used for ores (at least, not here). It was just created because there were so many mods adding the same ores, meaning you'd need 2 different steel types for 2 mods.
    Author:
    Niadel
